version_description:
A whole new ClipClaps coming right on schedule!
-Pull-to-refresh function added
-Push notification sound effect added
-Optimized UI
-Bug fixed

What’s new.
--Optimized the display for all kinds of resolution and the way of providing personalized video especially for you based on what you watch, like, and share.
--Changed the mechanism of rewards for watching videos. Instead of giving coins

Hi, clappers! The new version is coming right on schedule. Let’s take a look!
-Raffle Section added. Allow users to win real cash through raffle.
-Cash coupon added to the online mall. Users can redeem cash in a smaller amount
-Bug fixed. Optimiz

Hi, clappers! The new version is coming right on schedule. Let’s take a look!

–Brand new video browsing experience.

Hello, clappers. A early Merry Christmas to you guys!
–The whole new interaction design just for you
–New video browsing reward system added
–Bug fixed

Hi, clappers. There are few changes on our latest update.
-Fix the problem that some phone models cannot sign up

Dear clappers, we have a big surprise for you!

-Clapteam module optimized. More team members, more coins!

Merry Christmas, clappers! This time, we have prepared a surprise for you!
–Personal Page upgraded. You can check your friend's page now.
–UI optimized. New update pop–up, new feeling!
–Bug fixed. Login with PayPal bug fixed. No more crashes.

Happy New Year, clappers! This time, we have prepared a surprise for you!
–Bug fixed. Login with PayPal bug fixed.

What's up, clappers? We have added some interesting features this time!
-New columns are added for users to subscribe.
-Multi-picture upload function added. Users now can upload multiple pictures in one post.
